subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: My First P-SB7 Session
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
It's the spirit box doing all of it -

"The P-SB7 utilizes a milli-second adjustable Forward or Reverse frequency
"sweep" technique coupled with a proprietary high frequency synthetic noise
or "white noise" distributed between frequency steps."

On Mon, Jun 7, 2010 at 6:55 AM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

>
>
>  Yeah, that's probably what it is "white noise" so what is being used to
> make that white noise is my question? Tks. sf
>
>
>  -----Original Message-----
> From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostresearch.com>
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Sun, Jun 6, 2010 9:07 pm
> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: My First P-SB7 Session
>
>
>  It's just the spirit box, my daughter, and me. I am not sure what your
> hearing. Which file do you hear it in?
>
> It is an auto sweep, so you hear the regular switching of the channels.
> This particular device adds more white noise in the background, so maybe
> that is what you are hearing as well. It has more of shhhh sound per switch
> than a Frank's box or shack hack.
>
>  On Sun, Jun 6, 2010 at 6:43 PM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:
>
>>

>> > > Hi All,

>> > > These are from my first session with my new P SB-7.
>> > >
>> > > I conducted this experiment with my 6 year old daughter. Unfortunatley
>>
>> > you
>> > > will hear her say what she thinks she hears in the files. Please try
>> not
>> > > to be influenced by her. I will admit though that she seems to hear
>> > these
>> > > things much better then I can.
>> > >
>> > > Though I am still not convinced, some of these are uncanny, and I was
>> > > surprised. I will be conducting ongoing, regular experiments with
>> this.
>> > >

>> > >
>> > > Thanks!
>> > > April
>> > >
